verses.text: Now \add these are\add* the \w divisions|strong="H4256"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*. The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*; \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w*, and \w Abihu|strong="H0030"\w*, \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w*, and \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*.

But \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w* and \w Abihu|strong="H0030"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* their \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and had no \w children|strong="H1121"\w*: therefore \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* and \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w* executed the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w distributed|strong="H2505"\w* them, both \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w*, and \w Ahimelech|strong="H0288"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*, according to their \w offices|strong="H6486"\w* in their \w service|strong="H5656"\w*.

And there were \w more|strong="H7227"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w men|strong="H1397"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* than of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*; and \add thus\add* were they \w divided|strong="H2505"\w*. Among the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \add there were\add* \w sixteen|strong="H8337"\w* chief \w men|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \add their\add* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w eight|strong="H8083"\w* among the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w* according to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

Thus were they \w divided|strong="H2505"\w* by \w lot|strong="H1486"\w*, one \w sort|strong="H0428"\w* with \w another|strong="H0428"\w*; for the \w governors|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, and \w governors|strong="H8269"\w* \add of the house\add* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, were of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w*, and of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*.

And \w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nethaneel|strong="H5417"\w* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*, \add one\add* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w wrote|strong="H3789"\w* them \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, and \w Ahimelech|strong="H0288"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w*, and \add before\add* the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*: \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w principal|strong="H0001"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w* being \w taken|strong="H0270"\w* for \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w*, and \add one\add* \w taken|strong="H0270"\w* for \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*.\f + \fr 24.6 \ft principal…: Heb. house of the father\f*
Now the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w lot|strong="H1486"\w* came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w Jehoiarib|strong="H3080"\w*, the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* to \w Jedaiah|strong="H3048"\w*,
The \w third|strong="H7992"\w* to \w Harim|strong="H2766"\w*, the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* to \w Seorim|strong="H8188"\w*,
The \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* to \w Malchijah|strong="H4441"\w*, the \w sixth|strong="H8345"\w* to \w Mijamin|strong="H4326"\w*,
The \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* to \w Hakkoz|strong="H6976"\w*, the \w eighth|strong="H8066"\w* to \w Abijah|strong="H0029"\w*,
The \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* to \w Jeshua|strong="H3442"\w*, the \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* to \w Shecaniah|strong="H7935"\w*,
The \w eleventh|strong="H6249"\w* to \w Eliashib|strong="H0475"\w*, the \w twelfth|strong="H8147"\w* to \w Jakim|strong="H3356"\w*,
The \w thirteenth|strong="H7969"\w* to \w Huppah|strong="H2647"\w*, the \w fourteenth|strong="H0702"\w* to \w Jeshebeab|strong="H3428"\w*,
The \w fifteenth|strong="H2568"\w* to \w Bilgah|strong="H1083"\w*, the \w sixteenth|strong="H8337"\w* to \w Immer|strong="H0564"\w*,
The \w seventeenth|strong="H7651"\w* to \w Hezir|strong="H2387"\w*, the \w eighteenth|strong="H8083"\w* to \w Aphses|strong="H6483"\w*,
The \w nineteenth|strong="H8672"\w* to \w Pethahiah|strong="H6611"\w*, the \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* to \w Jehezekel|strong="H3168"\w*,
The \w one|strong="H0259"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* to \w Jachin|strong="H3199"\w*, the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* to \w Gamul|strong="H1577"\w*,
The \w three|strong="H7969"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* to \w Delaiah|strong="H1806"\w*, the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* and \w twentieth|strong="H6242"\w* to \w Maaziah|strong="H4590"\w*.

These \add were\add* the \w orderings|strong="H6486"\w* of them in their \w service|strong="H5656"\w* to \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, according to their \w manner|strong="H4941"\w*, \w under|strong="H3027"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* their \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* him.

¶ And the \w rest|strong="H3498"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* \add were these:\add* Of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w*; \w Shubael|strong="H7619"\w*: of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shubael|strong="H7619"\w*; \w Jehdeiah|strong="H3165"\w*.\f + \fr 24.20 \ft Shubael: also called, Shebuel\f*
Concerning \w Rehabiah|strong="H7345"\w*: of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Rehabiah|strong="H7345"\w*, the \w first|strong="H7218"\w* \add was\add* \w Isshiah|strong="H3449"\w*.

Of the \w Izharites|strong="H3325"\w*; \w Shelomoth|strong="H8013"\w*: of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shelomoth|strong="H8013"\w*; \w Jahath|strong="H3189"\w*.\f + \fr 24.22 \ft Shelomoth: also called, Shelomith\f*

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \add of Hebron;\add* \w Jeriah|strong="H3404"\w* \add the first\add*, \w Amariah|strong="H0568"\w* the \w second|strong="H8145"\w*, \w Jahaziel|strong="H3166"\w* the \w third|strong="H7992"\w*, \w Jekameam|strong="H3360"\w* the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w*.
\add Of\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w*; \w Michah|strong="H4318"\w*: of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Michah|strong="H4318"\w*; \w Shamir|strong="H8053"\w*.

The \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Michah|strong="H4318"\w* \add was\add* \w Isshiah|strong="H3449"\w*: of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Isshiah|strong="H3449"\w*; \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*.

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w* \add were\add* \w Mahli|strong="H4249"\w* and \w Mushi|strong="H4187"\w*: the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jaaziah|strong="H3269"\w*; \w Beno|strong="H1121"\w*.

¶ The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w* by \w Jaaziah|strong="H3269"\w*; \w Beno|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w Shoham|strong="H7719"\w*, and \w Zaccur|strong="H2139"\w*, and \w Ibri|strong="H5681"\w*.
Of \w Mahli|strong="H4249"\w* \add came\add* \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w*, who had no \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.
Concerning \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w*: the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w* \add was\add* \w Jerahmeel|strong="H3396"\w*.

The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* also of \w Mushi|strong="H4187"\w*; \w Mahli|strong="H4249"\w*, and \w Eder|strong="H5740"\w*, and \w Jerimoth|strong="H3406"\w*. These \add were\add* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* after the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

These likewise \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w lots|strong="H1486"\w* over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* in the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, and \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w*, and \w Ahimelech|strong="H0288"\w*, and the \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* and \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, even the \w principal|strong="H7218"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* their \w younger|strong="H6996"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*.
